articles.title: A cancer patient carried coronavirus for 105 days, without symptoms: Case study - Times Now
articles.description: According to Munster, this could be the longest case of anyone being actively infected with the coronavirus while remaining asymptomatic.
articles.content: New York: While most people infected with the novel coronavirus actively shed the pathogen for about eight days, scientists have reported an unusual case of a blood cancer patient who carried the vir… [+2925 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: France posts record 60,486 new coronavirus cases - Reuters India
articles.description: France registered a record 60,486 new confirmed coronavirus cases on Friday, after posting a record 58,046 on Thursday, health ministry data showed.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: Coronavirus update | US daily COVID-19 cases hit new record, topping 120,000 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: More than 9.6 million people have been infected and 234,000 have died in the US so far during the pandemic, by far the highest tolls in absolute terms globally.
articles.content:
More than 120,000 coronavirus cases were reported in the US in the past 24 hours, smashing a daily record set the day before, according to a tally by Johns Hopkins University.
